title: Netflix accidentally leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ premiere date - 123telugu
summary:
Netflix Accidentally Leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ Premiere Date

Published on Jan 2, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

The recent leak from Netflix revealed the long-awaited premiere date for ‘Squid Game 3’ as June 27, 2025, generating excitement among fans.

  • Recent season, ‘Squid Game 2’, had over 62 million views but didn't match the success of its predecessor.
  • The leaked release date came from a now-deleted YouTube video by Netflix.
  • There are no new star additions for Season 3, as Netflix dispelled rumors about Leonardo DiCaprio joining the cast.
  • Creators are under pressure to craft innovative games for the new season to recapture the series' initial excitement.
“As fans eagerly await Squid Game 3, all eyes are on how the show will evolve to reclaim its place as a cultural phenomenon.”

This leak has excited fans, but it also raises questions about the series' ability to maintain its momentum and cultural significance.
newTitle: Netflix Accidentally Leaks ‘Squid Game 3’ Premiere Date

Pushpa 2 box office Day 28: Allu Arjun film welcomes 2025 in style - India Today
summary:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 28: Allu Arjun's Film Welcomes 2025 in Style

Published On: Jan 2, 2025

Source: India Today

Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2: The Rule welcomed 2025 in style, with a significant increase in box office collection on January 1.

  • The film earned ₹1,184 crore nett in India over 28 days.
  • On January 1, it saw a 70% increase in collection, earning ₹13.15 crore nett on that day.
  • The Hindi version generated ₹9.5 crore nett, while the Telugu version earned ₹3.15 crore nett.
  • The total earnings include ₹774.65 crore nett from the Hindi version and ₹330.53 crore from the Telugu version.
  • Pushpa 2 aims for a ₹2,000-crore gross worldwide milestone.
“Pushpa 2 is still continuing its dream run in theatres, especially in the Hindi belt.”

The film, directed by Sukumar, features Allu Arjun alongside Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil. It has been a record-breaking success globally.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Hits ₹1,184 Crore on Day 28

title: Jennifer Garner’s family 'wants' her back with ex Ben Affleck especially after… - Hindustan Times
summary:
Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 06:57 AM IST

Jennifer Garner's family is rooting for a reunion between the actress and her ex-husband Ben Affleck, as the former couple has been spending quality time together with their children, including during holidays. While Garner maintains a relationship with her current beau, John Miller, her family believes there's still chemistry between her and Affleck.

Garner and Affleck, who share three children, have been spotted together recently, fueling speculation about a possible reconciliation. The 'Gone Girl' star is currently going through a high-profile divorce from Jennifer Lopez.

  1. Garner's family is hoping for a reunion.The former couple has been spending more time together.Affleck's friends and family are supportive of a reunion.Garner's current partner, John Miller, may feel like a 'third wheel.'
"Ben is laying it on thick, he’s giving Jen so much of himself and his attention and being so charming," a source told In Touch. "It’s very hard not to love him when he’s acting this way, and a lot of people are predicting that they could end up back together."

While there's no confirmation of a reunion, Garner's family and friends are optimistic about the possibility of the former couple getting back together.
newTitle: Jennifer Garner's Family Hopes for Reunion with Ex-Husband Ben Affleck

title: PM Modi matches beats with Diljit Dosanjh, beats table like dholak as Punjabi singer croons. Watch - Hindustan Times
Pushpa 2 India Box Office Day 28 (Early Trends): Almost 70% Jump & 1208 Crore – Allu Arjun Is Still Screaming Jhukega Nahi Saala! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2: Box Office Day 28 - Early Trends Show Almost 70% Jump, Estimated Earnings at 1208 Crore

Date & Source: January 1, 2024, Koimoi

It has been 28 days, and Pushpa 2 is still performing exceptionally well at the box office, with estimated earnings of 1208 - 1209 crore! Mounted on a budget of 500 crore, the film has registered a profit of 141.6% at the box office in India.

Pushpa 2 India Box Office Day 28 Estimates

On the 28th day, January 1, the fourth Wednesday, Pushpa 2 roared yet again on the New Year holiday with almost a 70% jump from the previous day and brought almost 13 - 13.5 crore collection at the box office, taking the total earnings to more than 1208 crore!

Will Pushpa 3 See The Light Of The Day?

Earlier this year, at the Berlin Film Festival, Allu Arjun has already discussed the idea of Pushpa 3 and turning the film into a franchise. It would be interesting to see if the idea sees the light of the day sooner than planned owing to the magnanimous box office collection delivered by the sequel.
newTitle: Pushpa 2: Box Office Day 28 - Early Trends Show Almost 70% Jump, Estimated Earnings at 1208 Crore

title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 28: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer shatters records; earns o - TOI Etimes
summary:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 28: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer shatters records; earns over Rs 10 crore on New Year's day

Publication Date: January 1, 2024

Source: Times of India

The unstoppable 'Pushpa 2: The Rule', starring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to break records at the box office, achieving remarkable earnings even in its fourth week.

  • On Day 28, the film earned an estimated Rs 13.15 crore across all languages.
  • The Hindi version contributed approximately Rs 9.5 crore, a rare figure for a film this late in its theatrical run.
  • The Telugu version added Rs 3.15 crore to the day's total.
  • Dubbing versions in Tamil, Kannada, and Malayalam accounted for about Rs 1 crore.
  • The cumulative earnings of Pushpa 2 now stand at approximately Rs 1184.65 crore, cementing its status among the highest-grossing Indian films of all time.
The film's strong New Year’s Day performance saw a staggering 70.78% boost in overall collections.

As Pushpa 2 shows no signs of slowing down, it is anticipated to climb further in box office rankings, astonishing fans and the industry alike.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Shatters Box Office Records on New Year's Day

title: Angelina Jolie's kids wanted her to defend herself in 8-year divorce battle; Brad Pitt source counters with winery sale - Hindustan Times
summary:
Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie's Kids and the Ongoing Divorce Saga

Date & Source: January 1, 2025, Hindustan Times

Introduction: Despite finalizing their divorce, Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's legal battle continues, with their kids taking sides and a contentious winery sale at the center of their dispute.

  1. Jolie and Pitt's kids have publicly supported their mother during the divorce process.
  2. Three of their six children have dropped 'Pitt' from their names.
  3. Jolie's sons Maddox and Pax worked with her on a movie set, showing their support.
  4. Pitt and Jolie's divorce settlement was finalized on December 30, 2024.
  5. Their fight over the French winery, Chateau Miraval, continues.

A source close to Jolie told PEOPLE that her kids 'wanted her to speak up for herself, to defend herself over these years but she reminds them to focus on changing laws over telling public stories.'

A Brad Pitt source accused Jolie of deliberately disregarding their agreement regarding the winery, stating that she sold her share to 'punish' Pitt.

Conclusion: Despite the finalization of their divorce, Pitt and Jolie's legal battle continues, with their kids taking sides and the future of their co-owned winery at stake.
newTitle: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie's Kids and the Ongoing Divorce Saga

title: Sajid Khan recalls tough time after MeToo allegations despite clean chit: 'I have thought of ending my li - TOI Etimes
summary:
Title: Sajid Khan Recalls Tough Time After MeToo Allegations Despite Clean Chit: 'I Have Thought of Ending My Life Many Times in the Last Six Years'

Date: 2023-03-08, Source: Times of India

In 2018, during the #MeToo movement, Sajid Khan faced multiple sexual harassment allegations, which severely impacted his career. After six years of silence, the 54-year-old filmmaker opens up about the mental and physical toll this period has inflicted on him.

  1. Allegations led to a career collapse overnight.
  2. Sajid faced financial hardships, including selling his house.
  3. He contemplated ending his life multiple times.
  4. Despite clearance from the Indian Film and Television Directors Association (IFTDA), he struggled to find work.
  5. Sajid acknowledged his blunt personality and past offensive humor, expressing regret and a change in his communication style.
  6. He has a film starting mid-year but acknowledges the challenges in the industry.

"I have thought of ending my life many times in the last six years." - Sajid Khan

Sajid emphasizes his desire to entertain and move forward, despite the hardships he has faced.
newTitle: Sajid Khan Opens Up About Struggles After #MeToo Allegations: 'I've Thought of Ending My Life Many Times'
